positions.title: Senior Research Scientist
positions.description: Leading research initiatives in applying deep learning to medical images and electronic health records for predictive analytics. Heading a team of 5 researchers focusing on early disease detection models.

positions.title: Research Associate
positions.description: Conducted research on applications of machine learning in healthcare as part of my PhD program. Collaborated with clinical departments to implement and validate AI models in real-world healthcare settings.

positions.title: Software Engineering Intern
positions.description: Developed backend services for a healthcare analytics platform. Implemented data processing pipelines for medical data and created APIs for frontend consumption.
